reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a glitch in our itinerary as our flight into Athens was canceled, so we called Guest House Plakias to change our check in date. Owner Nikos spoke excellent English. He was extremely warm and friendly. He gave us a room on the ground floor with discount (all the rooms upstairs with view of meteora were taken.) Their main business is the tavern (I think?) with delicious greek food (souvlaki) and breakfast (which is included) is served there as well. My spouse wasn't feeling well on the night of our arrival, so Nikos offered us room service with complimentary bottled water. Complimentary breakfast was awesome with omelet, bread, cheese, jam, juice, tea and coffee. Accepts credit cards too, which is great, but only Nikos knows how to operate it (ATM is in the next town, few minutes by bus.) Bus to Meteora is only a short walk away and Nikos will provide you with all the bus/train departure information you'll need.
reviews.title: Great hospitality

reviews.text: Room was very clean with good a/c and a balcony. Shower was simple (no shower curtain) and soap was provided. Bring other toiletries! All in all an excellent stay.
reviews.title: Wonderful establishment with cordial owners
